name: happy red cube game
description: Some information about me : Hello , Guys . My Name is Sami i am 12 years old from north africa My dream is when I grow up to be a game developer , i made my first game with blender engine to have some fun and theni decide to share this my game with you , i hope you enjoy my game and support me so can make more games in futurs  More info about my game -the character you are playing in this game is  cube -This version of the game is alpha version 1 -If you arrived in the area in yellow color, you are a winner -Red barriers will kill you inside the game -In alpha 2 version there is a check point and the game will becomes much longer. thank you.
